name: Projects
body:
## Projects in R

### ersilia.city - A simulated city

Utilizing historical data, procedural generation, statistical methods and machine learning techniques, Ersilia (named in homage to Italo Calvino's book, _Invisible Cities_) will be an on-going project with increasing scope, meant to provide data, images, reports, events, etc. on the population, weather, geography, and development of a simulated city. 

### Plot Pictures and Animations

Using R's plotting tools to create interesting graphics (think faces, landscapes, etc)

## Other projects

### Rummage Sailor

An app for listing and finding rummage sales. Includes route-planning, timing, and user accounts.

### Contact

I love feedback and collaboration. I can be reached by e-mail at christopher@walnutdata.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
